Package controller

Class GameEngineTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GameEngineTest
  • public class GameEngineTest
extends java.lang.Object
    GameEngine Test

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameEngineTest()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void testEditContinent()  
      void testEditCountry()
      Test to check addition and deletion of countries Checked by adding a correct country id and, country with id already present in map Checked by removing a country and also checked that correct results are obtained by removing country id which is not present in map.
      void testEditMap()
      Test to check map editing is allowed and executed correctly or not Checks that a map is properly loaded in edit mode Checked with a file with correct name, incorrect name and file without .map as extension
      void testEditNeighbor()
      Test to check addition and deletion of neighbors Checked by adding a country to neighbor list of another country, and also checked that correct results were obtained by adding already added country to neighbor Checked that countries are correctly removed from source country neighbor list and correct results are obtained when a country is not a neighbor of source and is tried to remove
      void testExecuteCommand()
      main executeCommand test Checks whether any command is executed or not
      void testGamePlayer()
      Test to check whether players are added/removed correctly or not Checked by adding a correct player name and, player with name already present in game Checked by removing a player and also checked that correct results are obtained by removing player name which is not present in game.
      void testLoadMap()
      Test to check loaded map Checks if a map is properly loaded Checked with a file with correct name, incorrect name and file without .map as extension
      void testSaveMap()
      Test to check map saving is allowed and executed correctly or not Checks that a map is properly loaded in edit mode Checked with a file with correct name, incorrect name and file without .map as extension
      void testValidateMap()
      This function tests the validateMap function with different conditions like if the map is null, without countries, not traversable and other different conditions.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
